Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

MILES_LIST_MIDI_FLAGS

The basic type MILES_LIST_MIDI_FLAGS specifies flags to use when listing a MIDI file.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 AILMIDILIST_ROLANDSYSEX Display the System Exclusive messages in Roland format.
 AILMIDILIST_ROLANDUN Display an unabridged version of the Roland Programmer's Reference in the MIDI Listing (note that this will create a huge listing).
 AILMIDILIST_ROLANDAB Display an abridged version of the Roland Programmer's Reference in the MIDI Listing (note that this will create a larger listing).


Group: Utility Services
Related Functions: AIL_list_MIDI
